Copyright (c) 2020-2021 lokka30, All Rights Reserved.

LevelledMobs is a plugin designed to be installed with the SpigotMC
Minecraft server software, changing various aspects about entities
on the server, such as increasing their attack damage and movement speed.

This program is free software: you can redistribute it and/or =
modify it under the terms of the GNU Affero General Public License
as published by the Free Software Foundation, either version 3 of
the License, or (at your option) any later version.

This program is distributed in the hope that it will be useful,
but WITHOUT ANY WARRANTY; without even the implied warranty of
MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.  See the
GNU Affero General Public License for more details.

You may view a copy of the GNU Affero General Public License in our
source code (see LICENSE.md), otherwise, see: https://www.gnu.org/licenses
